summary: A test suite that verifies the functionality of the Augeas‑based configuration‑tree node used by the Certbot Apache plugin, checking operations such as adding, deleting and locating blocks, comments and directives, handling initialization failures, persisting changes and managing node parameters.
business_intent: Provide automated regression protection for the Apache configuration parsing and manipulation logic in Certbot, ensuring that changes to the Augeas integration do not break configuration handling.
